author: Amartya Biswas
text: .. You liars. I have the proof that you people never contacted me via telephone or social media. My phone was on the whole time. Now I'm filling a complaint with TRAI because enough is enough! Today I again made a complaint through call but now I don't trust your...

author: Amartya Biswas
text: ... complaint you guys give me the same thing that you are looking into it. Infact in my last complaint, nobody even gave me any response that when it'll be fixed and Now I'm getting a message that you are closing my complaint because you couldn't reach me...

author: Amartya Biswas
text: Please share this message a lot. This type of treatment of customer must be stopped.

author: Amartya Biswas
text:

author: Amartya Biswas
text: .... You 1200 rupees? It's takes takes hours and a very good amount of luck to open youtube. I have complained before also regarding this and you people promised me the problem will solved in 10 days. Its been a month now! And none of my family member are...

author: Amartya Biswas
text: I'm a RED exclusive customer and this is the kind of service you are providing me?, Its just unimaginable. And I can't even think on what cause you can even think of sending me a bill of 1200 rupees. After getting such pathetic service, you think I'll pay...

author: Amartya Biswas
text:
Hey @Zomato why did you remove the COD option from the payment methods?
This just made ordering very difficult for me. Without COD I wasn't able to order lunch today. Please bring back COD. Without COD I won't be ordering anything over ZOMATO now.

author: Amartya Biswas
text:
Her happiness is not
my responsibility. She should be happy
and I should be happy individually. Then
we come together and share our
happiness. Giving someone a
responsibility to make you happy when
you can't do it for yourself is selfish. 

Let that sink in.

author: Amartya Biswas

author: Amartya Biswas
text:
Him:  You had a bad break up. Does it still 
           hurt you sometimes? 

Me:   Well, sometimes it doesn't, 
          sometimes it doesn't.

Him:  They both are the same. 

Me:    Exactly!
